cards.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
{2}{W}{U}: Create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying, then draw a card.
If you would draw a card while you control more creatures with flying than you have cards in your library, you win the game instead.

{1}{U}{B}: Exile Abyxya from your hand with ten depth counters on it. Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, remove a depth counter from Abyxya. When the last one is removed, you may cast Abyxya without paying its mana cost.
During each of your turns, you may cast one card from your graveyard.

Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is dealt damage, destroy it.
{2}{B}{R}: Exile target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 2/2 black Zombie creature.

Trample
Dante's power is equal to the number of snow permanents you control.
{1}{S}{S}{S}: Create Hreigr, the Blizzard's Maw, a legendary snow 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste.

Vigilance
When Mikkino enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{4}{G}{W}: Create Azos's Spine, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +4/+4,” “Whenever equipped creature attacks, exile target permanent defending player controls,” and equip {5}. Attach it to Mikkino.

Flying
When Rivha enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Whenever Rivha attacks, sacrifice another attacking creature. If you do, create a white 3/3 Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

When Lady Ilyrana Jhalach enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black and green Elf Archer creature tokens with reach.
{G}, Tap an untapped Elf you control: Target Elf creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{1}{B}, Tap two untapped Elves you control: Target non-Elf creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

At the beginning of your end step, untap up to three target permanents.
Whenever an opponent casts a permanent spell, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](The copy becomes a token.)[/i]

Flying, haste
Whenever Giradrus attacks, draw a card, then you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that creature at end of combat unless it's a Dragon.

Trample, lifelink, indestructible
Qayim can't attack or block unless his power is 6 or greater.
{1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Flash
Headmaster Rudlington has hexproof as long as it's your turn.
{X}: Choose a card with mana value X at random. You may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost. X can't be 0. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token. You gain 1 life.
[0]: Until end of turn, Seto San becomes a 3/3 Human Warrior creature with lifelink and “Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn” that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
[-7]: Exile all other nonland, nontoken permanents.

[+1]: Scry 3, then draw a card.
[-2]: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a 2/2 colorless Construct artifact creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into its owner's hand.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “If a nonland, nontoken permanent would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control, it enters the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature instead.”

[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or planeswalker card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[0]: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, you may put a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value plus one from outside the game onto the battlefield.
[-3]: Destroy target nonbasic permanent.

cards.rules_text:
When Blade Savant enters the battlefield, traverse Al Tabaq. [i](Planeswalk to Al Tabaq. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If that creature is equipped, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

First strike
[i]Wanderlust[/i] — As long as you control four or more differently named lands, players can't draw more than one card each turn, and players can't cast more than one spell each turn.

Vigilance
When Stalwart Stoat enters the battlefield, traverse Onora. [i](Planeswalk to Onora. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Spells that target cost {1} more to cast.

Flying
When Archangel of Balance enters the battlefield, each player chooses a number of cards in their hand equal to the fewest number of cards in any player's hand, then discards the rest.
cards.rules_text2: Exile target creature. Its controller draws a card. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Traverse Cirrusea, then destroy all creatures without flying. [i](Planeswalk to Cirrusea. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]No bird nor man alike can argue with the words of heaven.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return up to three target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then traverse Ghariv. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step. [i](Planeswalk to Ghariv. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
Creatures without flying can't attack you.
[+1]: Until end of turn, Iapetus and up to one other target creature or planeswalker you control each become a 4/4 white Angel creature with flying, vigilance and indestructible.
[-3]: Exile target creature.

cards.rules_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card unless you pay {2}.
cards.rules_text2: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: You may have Berylscale Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has “When this creature enters the battlefield, venture into Kahembo” and “{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Berylscale Mimic becomes a copy of target creature and gains this ability.”

Flying
When Thunder Raptor enters the battlefield, traverse Cirrusea. [i](Planeswalk to Cirrusea. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Other Birds you control get +2/+1.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Prepare yourself. The coming storm brings winds of change.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Otter Out of Water enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Otter creature tokens with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
[i]Wanderlust[/i] — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control four or more differently named lands, until end of turn target creature you control gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

Choose two —
• Traverse Elmare. [i](Planeswalk to Elmare. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
• Counter up to one target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability from a nonland source.

When Mystic Galleon enters the battlefield, traverse Shiryen. [i](Planeswalk to Shiryen. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever Mystic Galleon deals combat damage to a player, return to your hand target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard that was put there this turn.
Crew 1

cards.special_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
[+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
[-7]: Shuffle all instant, sorcery, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard into a new library. You get an emblem with “Whenever you draw a card from your main library, draw a card from each of your other libraries.”

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink
When Murderous Rider dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.
cards.rules_text2: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Grave Harmonist enters the battlefield, traverse Ghariv. [i](Planeswalk to Ghariv. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Menace
When Cankerbough Ritualist enters the battlefield, traverse Rocerynn. [i](Planeswalk to Rocerynn. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever another Elf creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

When Freyhild Warlord enters the battlefield, create two 2/1 black Warrior snow creature tokens with haste and “this creature can't block,” then traverse Glacia. [i](Planeswalk to Glacia. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
{1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return Freyhild Warlord from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
[i]Wanderlust[/i] — If you control four or more differently named lands, you may cast a card with mana value 4 or less from your hand by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

When Tentaclysm enters the battlefield, traverse Elmare. [i](Planeswalk to Elmare. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever a card is put into your graveyard, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Sacrifice eight Tentacles: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token. Each opponent loses 8 life.

cards.special_text:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life, then put a loyalty counter on Sora.
[0]: Create Horus, Dark Familiar, a legendary 2/2 black Bird creature token with flying and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.”
[-2]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.”

cards.rules_text:
When Floe Prowler enters the battlefield, traverse Vrok. [i](Planeswalk to Vrok. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
{S}{S}: Floe Prowler becomes a Beast Mutant with base power and toughness 3/3.
{2}{S}{S}: If Floe Prowler is a Mutant, put a double strike counter and a trample counter on it.
Whenever Burning Hart deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to up to one target planeswalker that player controls.
cards.rules_text2: Forest Fire deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Djinnis of Man's Trials enters the battlefield, traverse Al Tabaq. [i](Planeswalk to Al Tabaq. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose target creature you control. If that creature would deal combat damage to a player this turn, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

Haste, trample
When Summit Crusher enters the battlefield, traverse Glacia. [i](Planeswalk to Glacia. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it deals 3 damage to each creature blocking it.

Superconduct deals 3 damage to each creature.
[i]Wanderlust[/i] — If you control four or more differently named lands, Superconduct deals 3 damage to each planeswalker and each opponent.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Perhaps next term the meteorology and electrophysics finals should be scheduled on different days.”
—Headmaster Rudlington[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Sea's Spoils enters the battlefield, traverse Shiryen. [i](Planeswalk to Shiryen. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, exile the top card of your library face down.
{R}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Sea's Spoils: Put all cards exiled with Sea's Spoils into their owners' hands.

cards.special_text:
If a source you control would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
[+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and cast it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]

Creatures you control have base power and toughness 3/3.

cards.special_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a green Aura enchantment token named Seal of Myrmidon attached to that creature. The token has enchant creature and “Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has hexproof.”
[+1]: Create a 3/2 green Seal creature token.
[-2]: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
[+1]: Tap or untap up to one target permanent. Draw a card at the beginning of the next end step.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts a spell, exile it with a time counter on it. They may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost at the beginning of their next upkeep.”

Creatures your opponents control assign combat damage equal to whichever is lower between their power and toughness.
[+1]: Up to one target creature's base toughness becomes 1 until your next turn. You gain 2 life.
[-6]: Take an extra turn after this one. If you cast a spell during that turn, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

Whenever a player casts a spell, Sigrid deals 1 damage to that player.
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +1/-1 and gains menace until end of turn.
[-6]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “If you would lose life, you lose the game instead.”

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
[+2]: Create a 3/3 red Panda creature token.
[-3]: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

If one or more counters would be put on another creature or planeswalker you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 green and white Otter Soldier creature token.
[-6]: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and indestructible.

You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. You lose life equal to its mana value.
[-3]: Create two 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying. You lose 3 life.

At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.
[+1]: You may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-X]: Destroy each other nonland permanent with mana value X or less.

Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-7]: Untap all lands you control. Until end of turn, they become 3/3 Elemental creatures with flying. They're still lands.

cards.card_name: Boxue, In Search of a Friend
cards.special_text:
As long as you control exactly one other planeswalker, Boxue has all loyalty abilities of that planeswalker.
[+2]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-X]: The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value X this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Creatures you control get +1/+0 as long as it's your turn.

[-6]: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. For each creature you control, you may have that creature fight target creature you don't control.

Whenever an opponent draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, that player discards a card.
[+1]: Dawson deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 2 life. Create a Treasure token.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “{2}, Sacrifice an artifact, creature, or planeswalker: Each opponent sacrifices a permanent.”

Whenever you discard a card, exile it. You may cast that card from exile until the end of your next turn.

[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a permanent an opponent control dies, you may pay {2}. If you do, put that card onto battlefield under your control.”

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
[+1]: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-8]: Create three 8/8 blue Kraken creature tokens. For each of those tokens, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard under it. That token has all abilities of that card.

Spells your opponents cast that target permanents you control cost {2} more to cast.
[+1]: Until end of turn, up to one target nonland permanent you control gains “Whenever this permanent becomes tapped, draw a card.”
[-3]: Choose another target nonland permanent. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[+1]: Up to one target creature gains trample, lifelink, and vigilance until end of turn.
[-2]: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Jomec Thuruk deals damage to any target equal to that creature's power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

[i]“Although not born directly of the land, they have an undeniable connection to it. Their bond is simple, pristine, and fierce, unmarred by greed and other mortal vices.”

cards.rules_text: Whenever Unbudging Badger attacks, if its power is 4 or greater, it gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Stand behind me, little ones. By my hand, no one falls today.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Elven Ally enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 on another target Elf you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She teaches her fellow students to listen to the forest. The trees do the rest.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Highland Pioneer enters the battlefield, search your library for a snow land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Every world has a harmony. When you are lost, nature's heartbeat will guide your hand.”
—Yvara Springhart[/i]

—Ruchi Ruka[/i]

{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Crumbling stones stand on crystal peaks, relics of the past serving as a reminder of life's fragility.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When you planeswalk to Citadel of the Aerie, create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
When you planeswalk to Cuxuri Trench, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them back on top and the other into your graveyard.
When you planeswalk to Freyhild Highlands, it deals 3 damage to up to one target player or planeswalker.
When you planeswalk to Rovia, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a basic snow land and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

When you planeswalk to Tinyvale, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put up to one creature card with power 3 or less from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.card_name: Thorne Chapel, Sanctum of His Dark Blood
cards.rules_text: When you planeswalk to Thorne Chapel, create a 1/1 black Cleric creature token with lifelink.
When you planeswalk to Catacombs of Castle Jhalach, mill three cards, then you may return an Elf creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
When you planeswalk to Mekini Oasis, choose a basic land type, then put a counter of that type on a land you control. It becomes that type in addition to its other types and is named Fabled Lands.
When you planeswalk to Cambaro, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
When you planeswalk to Ahaban Temple, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Twin Shivs with “Equipped creature gets +2/+0” and equip {2}.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{2}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Chilling Constellation becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and lifelink. It's still a land.

Sleeping Cairn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Sleeping Cairn becomes a 3/3 blue and black Elemental creature with “Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.” It's still a land.

Ravaging Runes enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Ravaging Runes becomes a 3/2 black and red Elemental creature with “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.” It's still a land.

Unshaken Oak enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{2}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Unshaken Oak becomes a 5/4 red and green Elemental creature with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals damage equal to its power to target planeswalker that player controls.” It's still a land.

Lumbering Vale enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Lumbering Vale becomes a 3/3 green and white Elemental creature with “Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.” It's still a land.

Roaming Remains enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{2}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Roaming Remains becomes a 3/2 white and black Elemental creature with “Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, up to one other target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.” It's still a land.

Muckroot Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{4}{S}: Until end of turn, Muckroot Falls becomes a 1/5 black and green Elemental creature with reach and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.” It's still a land.

Glacial Wonder enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{3}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Glacial Wonder becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with hexproof and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, untap each other land you control.” It's still a land.

Spirit Valley enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}{S}: Until end of turn, Spirit Valley becomes a 2/3 blue and red Elemental creature with “{UR}: Spirit Valley gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.” It's still a land.

Sundering Terrain enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{1}{S}{S}: Until end of turn, Sundering Terrain becomes a 4/2 red and white Elemental creature with first strike. It's still a land.
